標題： 【圖書館公告】113寒假優惠借期。【Library　Announce】Winter vacation’s preferential loan period.
日期： Tue, 26 Dec 2023 09:37:12 +0800

敬致 全體教職員生：
FUN 寒假，圖書館貼心為大家提供「寒假優惠借書」方案，鼓勵大家善加利用！
一、優惠借期
(一)優惠日：自113年1月2日(二)起借閱之圖書，應還日期：113年2月27日(二)或應到期日。
(二)服務對象：本校教職員工生
(三)適用資料：一般中、西文圖書及館際借書證。
(四)貼心提醒您：
1.113.1.2(二)以前借閱之資料仍依原“到期日”為準，請準時還書或續借，以免造成逾期罰款。
2.視聽資料、兒童書、國小教科書與隔夜借還之參考書等，維持原來的借期，不適用優惠借期，請注意歸還日期。
3.寒假仍持續提供預約服務，倘您無法到館取書者，請務必自行上網取消。關於預約資料有問題者，請來電洽詢或來信。
4.寒假期間若需圖書館寄送已可取之預約資料，請回信至library@gms.ndhu.edu.tw告知（註明：學號、姓名、手機、郵寄地址等資料），相關郵資費用由使用者返校後再至圖書館結清。
5.最後，請在返鄉或出國前，務必上網確認持借資料的到期日與預約狀況，以免造成逾期罰款。
敬祝
　　　　寒假愉快
　　　　　                    圖書資訊處 敬上
連絡電話：圖書館服務檯 (03)890-6838
E-mail：library@gms.ndhu.edu.tw

【Library Announce】Winter vacation’s preferential loan period
Dear Faculty Members and Students：
We provide “winter vacation’s preferential loan period” program to encourage you to make the best use of library resources!
1. Preferential loan period.
A. Offering date: For the books borrowed from Jan. 2nd, 2024 (Tue), the due date shall be Feb. 27th, 2024(Tue).
B. Clients: All faculty members, staffs, and students of NDHU.
C. Available resources: Eastern and Western language books, and interlibrary cards
D. Please notice:
i. Original due date remains unchanged for the materials borrowed before
Jan. 2nd, 2024(Tue). Please return books on time or renew them to avoid overdue fines.
ii. Except the available resources mentioned above, others ( like audio-visual materials, children's books, elementary school textbooks, overnight reference books, etc.) are not included in this preferential loan period.
Their original loan period and due dates remain unchanged.
So, please return them on time to avoid overdue fines.
iii. Reservation service is still available. If you are unable to check out the book on time, please cancel it on-line before the system notice you.
iv. Before going to your hometown or abroad, please check the due dates and your reservation status on-line in order to avoid overdue fines.

Sincerely,
Library and Information Center
National Dong Hwa University
